title: Kimchi fried rice
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon rapeseed oil', '30g beef mince', '1 spring onion, sliced, white and green parts separated', '150g kimchi, drained and chopped', '1 tablespoon gochujang (Korean chilli paste), or to taste', '560g cooked and chilled short-grain rice', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon butter', '1 egg']
